about.p1: Mark As Played is personal gaming blog and portfolio. Read reviews, enjoy the news, get to know the author better!
about.p2: Creating a blog about gaming has been my humble dream for several years. I waited ambitiously until my programming skills would reach a sufficient level for me to code everything myself. The day has finally come, the blog has started and my head is filled with dozens of ideas what I can do better, what to add new.
about.p3: The website is still under construction. In case of any problems, I sincerely apologize.
